author: slava77
body:
- the matrix short-hand remapping/renaming file is updated
    - add 2017 and 2018 fastsim workflows
        - the 2018 workflow was added to the short matrix in cms-sw/cmssw#35804; this update will resolve the bot warnings about the missing matrix map
    - improve grouping of Run-2 MC workflows which are not following the upgrade workflow "standard" numbering
- new plots added in reco comparisons for
    - diamondSampicLocalTracks , which was added in cms-sw/cmssw#35445
    - ticlSimTrackstersFromCP , which was added in cms-sw/cmssw#34800
title: reco comparisons: maps for 2017,2018 fastsim; new plots
